title: Tastylicious Adobong Pusit Recipe
ingredients: ▢ 3 lbs. small to medium sized squid cleaned and sliced
▢ 1 medium red onion sliced into small pieces
▢ 1 teaspoon squid ink tinta de calamar or cuttlefish ink, mixed with 3 tablespoons water (optional ingredient)
▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pot.
Once the oil becomes hot, saute garlic until it turns light brown.
Add onion and tomato. Saute until the onion gets soft
Add the squid. Sauté for 2 to 3 minutes
Remove the squid from the pan and place in a clean bowl.Set aside.
Pour soy sauce and water into the pan. Let boil.
Add vinegar. Let the liquid re-boil. Stir and cover the pan. Continue to cook in medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add the sautéed squid back in the pan along with sugar, salt, and ground black pepper. Stir. Continue to cook for 2 minutes. Note: do not overcook the squid to retain its tender texture.
Using a slotted spoon or a spider strainer, remove the squid from the cooking pot leaving the liquid behind. Arrange the squid in a bowl. Continue to cook the liquid until it reduces to half.
Pour the thick liquid into the serving bowl with the squid. Toss.
Serve with white rice. Share and enjoy!

title: Tornado Franks
instructions: Make the dough by combining all the dough ingredients in a bowl. Mix well. Knead until the texture becomes smooth.
Divide the dough into 4 to 6 equal parts. Roll until strings are formed. Set aside.
Skew each of the chicken franks with bamboo skewers and create a spiral incision. Fill each incision with dough strings. Set aside.
Heat cooking oil in a pan. Fry each skewed chicken franks for 3 minutes while turning over occasionally.
Remove from the pan. Let it cool down.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauce. Share and enjoy!

title: Stir Fried Chicken Franks
ingredients: ▢ 10 CDO Chicken Franks sliced in half
▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté garlic and onion until the onion softens.
Add CDO Franks. Sauté for 1 minute.
Add ketchup and oyster sauce. Stir and cook for 1 minute.
Season with salt and ground black pepper.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Asian Chicken Lettuce Wrap
ingredients: ▢ 450 grams CDO Homestyle Chicken Flakes in Oil
▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Wash the lettuce with running water and peel the leaves apart. Set aside.
Heat oil in a wok. Saute onion for 35 seconds.
Add Chicken Flakes. Continue cooking until the liquid evaporates completely.
Add carrot and jicama. Cook for 1 minute.
Add soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, and hoisin sauce. Stir.
Put the green onions into the wok and season with salt and ground black pepper as needed.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Serve with fresh lettuce.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: No Bake Macaroni
ingredients: ▢ 520 grams CDO Home Style Corned Beef in Pasta Sauce
▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the macaroni based on package instructions. Drain the water and set the macaroni aside.
Heat oil in a wide cooking pot. Sauté onion and garlic until the onion softens.
Add CDO Home Style Corned Beef in Pasta Sauce. Continue cooking for 3 to 5 minutes while stirring occasionally. Season with salt and ground black pepper as needed.
Put the cooked macaroni into the pot. Toss and cook for 2 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate. Top with grated cheese and garnish with chopped parsley.
Serve hot. Share and enjoy!

title: Loco Moco Recipe
ingredients: ▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan. Fry the burger patties until both sides are completely cooked. Set aside.
Fry the eggs. Set aside.
Make the sauce by heating 2 tablespoons of cooking oil in a saucepan. Saute onion and mushrooms for 2 minutes.
Pour the beef broth into the pan and season with soy sauce and Worcestershire sauce. Let boil. Cook for 3 minutes in low heat setting.
Season with salt and ground black pepper.
Make a slurry by combining 2 tablespoons cornstarch with 3 tablespoons water. Stir until well blended.
Pour the slurry into the saucepan. Stir until the sauce thickens.
Arrange the CDO Ulam Burger Patties on a plate over rice. Top with sauce. Add fried egg. Garnish with chopped parsley.
Share. Serve and enjoy!

title: Loaded Nachos with Corned Beef
ingredients: ▢ 260 grams CDO Home Style Corned Beef in Pasta Sauce
▢ ½ cup black olives pitted and sliced
instructions: Make the meat sauce by heating the cooking in a pan. Sauté onion until it softens. Add CDO Home Style Corned Beef in Pasta Sauce. Cook for 2 minutes. Add taco seasoning. Stir and cook for 2 to 3 minutes. Let it cool down.
Arrange tortilla chips on a wide plate. Drizzle cheese dip all over and top with meat sauce.
Spread the remaining topping ingredients over the meat sauce.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Longganisa Pasta Recipe
ingredients: ▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Sauté onion and garlic until the onion softens.
Pour the tomato sauce into the pan. Let boil.
Add Italian seasoning and red pepper flakes. Cover and continue cooking in low heat for 15 minutes.
Thicken the sauce by adding tomato paste and then put the cooked penne pasta into the pan. Toss. Cook for 1 minute.
Slice the longganisa into half and add these into the pan. Toss.
Season with salt and ground black pepper. Add cheddar cheese.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve warm. Share and enjoy!

title: Filipino Chicken Pasta Alfredo
ingredients: ▢ 300 grams CDO Chicken Flakes in Oil
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Set aside.
Make the creamy sauce by melting butter in a cooking pot. Sauté onion and garlic until the onion softens.
Add CDO chicken flakes. Continue cooking for 2 minutes.
Pour the all-purpose cream into the pot. Let it boil. Adjust the heat to low setting. Continue cooking while stirring occasionally until the sauce thicken to your desired consistency.
Add parmesan cheese. Stir.
Put the cooked pasta unto the cooking pot with the sauce. Toss until well blended. Season with chopped parsley.
Transfer to a pasta bowl. Serve.
Share and enjoy!

title: Pinoy Buger Steak With Gravy
ingredients: ▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Fry the CDO Ulam Burger Patties until both sides are completely cooked. Set aside.

Make the mushroom gravy by melting the butter in a saucepan. Add the mushrooms and sauté for 1 minute. Add flour and stir until the texture becomes lumpy. Pour water. Stir until the gravy smoothens. Add beef bouillon and season with Worcestershire sauce, salt, and ground black pepper.
Arrange 3 burger patties on each plate with 1 cup cooked rice. Top with mushroom gravy and garnish with toasted garlic and chopped parsley. Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Air Fryer Longganisa Frittata Recipe
instructions: Slice the longganisa in half. Set aside.
Beat the eggs in a large bowl. Season with salt.
Add bell pepper, green peas, and cheddar cheese. Mix well.
Scoop a portion of the egg mixture into a silicon air fryer cup. Top with two slices of longganisa.
Air fry in 190C for 15 minutes or until the eggs gets cooked completely.
Remove the frittata from the silicon cups and arrange it on a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Pineapple Fried Rice
ingredients: ▢ Salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Beat the egg. Heat 2 tablespoons of cooking oil in a pan. Pour the beaten egg and fry until firm. Turn it over and do the same to the other side. Remove the egg and slice into smaller pieces.
Heat oil in a pan. Saute garlic and onion.
Add pineapple tidbits. Saute for 1 minute.
Add CDO Holiday Ham. Continue sauteing for 2 minutes.
Add bell pepper, cashew, and green peas. Stir.
Add leftover rice. Toss and then stir fry for 1 minute.
Pour soy sauce and add green onions.
Season with salt and ground black pepper and then add sliced egg. Transfer the pineapple fried rice to a serving plate. Serve. Share and enjoy.
